active_skill.name: Rocket Barrage
active_skill.description:
Sends rockets and molotov cocktails at the target enemy, dealing Fire DMG.

DMG Multiplier:
600%/640%/680%/720%/760%

Daze Multiplier:
351%/373%/397%/421%/444%

Cooldown 20s

additional_ability.name: Unusually Short Fuse
additional_ability.description: When there is at least one Anomaly character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. When the target is an Organic enemy, this buff increases by an additional 15%/19%/23%/27%/30%.

chain_attack.name: Rocket Blast!
chain_attack.description:
Jumps forward and fires a rocket, dealing Fire DMG to enemies in a large area ahead.

DMG Multiplier:
1024%/1092%/1161%/1229%/1297%

Daze Multiplier:
147%/156%/166%/176%/186%
